name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Network Engineer with over 10 years of experience in Routing, Switching, and Firewalls, specializing in automation and network architecture. Proficient in **CISCO**, **ACI**, and **F5** technologies, with a strong foundation in **Ansible** for automation and **Bash** scripting to enhance operational efficiency. Skilled in deploying and managing Stateful Firewalls and supporting network protocols like **IPv6** and **5G**. Expertise in technical problem-solving and analytical skills, proven through impactful contributions to leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Additional technical proficiency includes **Python** for automation solutions, ensuring high-performance network services.

• Implemented **Automation** strategies with **Ansible** to efficiently manage and deploy network configurations across multiple environments.
• Designed and optimized **Stateful Firewalls** to bolster security measures while ensuring continuous service uptime and reliability.
• Played a key role in developing event-driven solutions utilizing **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing of network transactions, resulting in a 20% increase in response times.
• Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and harnessed **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, achieving a 40% reduction in deployment times.
• Created and maintained regulatory data exchange pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring a 99.9% accuracy rate in data flow and compliance.
• Conducted security assessments and implemented best practices with OAuth2 and **Azure AD B2C**, achieving scalable authentication for over **5,000** users.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve system integration challenges, with a focus on **Technical problem-solving** and compliance oversight during release strategies.

Designed and implemented **automation** solutions to streamline network routing and switching processes, enhancing operational efficiency by **20%**.
Configured and maintained secure **firewalls** using **CISCO** technologies to ensure robust network security and compliance with industry standards.
Utilized **Ansible** for automated configuration management and orchestration, reducing deployment time from **10 hours** to **2 hours**.

Engaged in comprehensive testing and validation of network configurations, ensuring alignment with **JNCIA** certifications and compliance requirements.
